amendatorysection.catchline: Clerk of district court; trial docket; disposal; procedure.
amendatorysection.para: When after a lapse of ten years, if the record in the district court does not show any unfinished matter pending in the cases set out in the trial dockets, upon such notice as the court may direct, such trial dockets may be disposed of in any way that any judge of such court may direct when approval is given by the State Records Administrator pursuant to sections 84-1201 to 84-1220.
